EmailTemplate.name: 07-26-22 DBNK CBA Webinar Email 1.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Register! [Webinar] Be Bold, Be Different, but Get Back to Basics with Payments
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Are you challenged to keep up with the changing payments landscape? You’re not alone. Join NCR’s Doug Brown and PYMNTS’ Karen Webster as they analyze the strategic relevance of payments. Find out how the financial climate is impacting the payments’ landscape and why creating an exceptional experience is vital. Be Bold, Be Different, but Get Back to Basics with Payments Thursday, August 4 at 2 p.m. EDT / 11 a.m. PDT Register now <[[https://bit.ly/3NP7hi6]]> with discount code: NCR0804 Key topics of this one-hour webinar include: - Market volatility and why you need to have a payments strategy - What you need to know about mobile wallets, BNPL and the multitude of payment methods - The role of the financial institution in helping build financial literacy We hope you’ll join us! <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
